plot outline: Set in corrupt system of Nagpur Ankush a clerk wants his transfer back to his city in Mumbai.He takes helps of his senior clerk Salunkhe and gets trapped in his conspiracies A young star Aju Patil takes help of politician Prataprao to stop a project in his village and realizes he has become a scapegoat of Prataprao's game.Gajyabhau claims to be close to politicians and gets work done of people in return of favors.This explores how everyone is a puppet of corrupt system.
title: Nagpur Adhiveshan
plot: Two officials face a challenge while organizing _Nagpur Adhiveshan_ (qv), an annual political event in Nagpur. A politician plans Chalo Nagpur, a rally against the wishes of other politicians.

Set in corrupt system of Nagpur Ankush a clerk wants his transfer back to his city in Mumbai.He takes helps of his senior clerk Salunkhe and gets trapped in his conspiracies A young star Aju Patil takes help of politician Prataprao to stop a project in his village and realizes he has become a scapegoat of Prataprao's game.Gajyabhau claims to be close to politicians and gets work done of people in return of favors.This explores how everyone is a puppet of corrupt system.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
